description:
JOIN 600+ SUCCESSFUL STUDENTS, AND LEARN THE FASTEST WAY TO GROW YOUR TRAVEL BUSINESS WITH TRIP ADVISOR !!

**2016 VERSION UPDATED** THIS COURSE IS FULLY UP TO DATE WITH LATEST UPDATES FROM TRIPADVISOR & FOLLOWS ALL TRIPADVISOR GUIDELINES !!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The hotels, resorts and tour operators we help are officially in Top#3 in TripAdvisor is destinations with more than 100+ listings .

Some of them are doing a 35 million Annual business this year and their annual revenue was around 10 million in the previous year before they started concentrating on TripAdvisor

4+ hours of content and 53+ High Quality lectures based on 100% practical experience in helping big resorts and small bed and breakfasts as well as tour operators and travel agents in TripAdvisor .

This course is for hotels , tour operators, travel agents , attractions , restaurants , airbnb hosts , resorts and bed and breakfasts and anyone who is in hospitality or tourism industry

Join in!

-------------------------------------------------------

How to use TripAdvisor to grow your travel business is a step by step guide on how I used TripAdvisor to grow and market the businesses of hotels , tour operators, resorts and bed and breakfasts as well as other hospitality businesses.

With over 10 years of digital marketing experience in the hospitality industry, we have tried out all sorts of marketing and realized through experience that TripAdvisor is the largest travel marketing channel for any hospitality business . We focused on training and streamlining our efforts to improve our client's customer service, guest experience and social presence by using TripAdvsior and through this course we wanted to share those successful tips with hotels , tour operators, travel agents , attractions , restaurants , airbnb hosts , resorts and bed and breakfasts as well as other hospitality businesses from any part of the world.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The course is taught through practical examples by showcasing the best practices followed by hotels , tour operators, travel agents , attractions , restaurants , airbnb hosts , resorts and bed and breakfasts from different parts of the world. At the end of this course all students should be able to

  • Use TripAdvisor to grow & market travel/ hospitality business
  • Understand why TripAdvisor is the most important element in modern Travel Marketing
  • Understand ZMOT or Zero Moment of Truth in Travel Marketing
  • Develop deep understanding about TripAdvisor Guidelines
  • Getting more reviews that will rank your business high in TripAdvisor
  • Learn about submitting your travel business to TripAdvisor
  • Learn to use Management Center
  • Learn to respond to negative and positive reviews on TripAdvisor
  • Learn about Paid and FREE TripAdvisor Marketing Tools
  • Learn about using TripAdvisor Forums to win more guests
  • Learn about TripAdvisor best practices


-----------------------------------------------------

Some common questions:

Can anyone do this?

Yes, absolutely anyone can run a travel business or a tourism business. With my course I'll show hotels , tour operators, travel agents , attractions , restaurants , airbnb hosts , resorts and bed and breakfasts exactly how you can be successful in attracting more customers using TripAdvisor.

What if I don't have a TripAdvisor Listing ?

If you have a hospitality or a tourism business but does not have a TripAdvisor listing we will share with you on how you can get yourself listed and how you can get higher ranks in TripAdvisor after you get listed

What if I Have a TripAdvisor Listing with lot of negative reviews?

No Worries ! You can go through our course and tr to convert the negatives to positives

-------------------------------------------------------


TripAdvisor was a huge driver for my businesses and the businesses that we consult with and I want it to be the same for you. We've studied the features launched by TripAdvisor every year and have seen how their products have evolved, and have collaborated with hotels , tour operators, travel agents , attractions , restaurants , airbnb hosts , resorts and bed and breakfasts to bring this course together. In this course you'll get everything you need to skip the painful learning process of starting your listing and using it drive as many inquiries as possible .


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you follow our advice, we guarantee you will be successful with your TripAdvisor Listing. If you're struggling we are always here 7 days a week to answer your questions personally.

Thanks

Team WhiteDotDigital
